class.name: VisualScriptInputAction
class.brief_description: A Visual Script node returning a state of an action.
class.description: [VisualScriptInputAction] can be used to check if an action is pressed or released.

members.member: State of the action to check. See [enum Mode] for options.

constants.constant: [code]True[/code] if action is released (i.e. not pressed).
[code]True[/code] on the frame the action was pressed.
[code]True[/code] on the frame the action was released.
